body.name: ZERFUN Pro Wireless Microphone System 4 Channel, UHF Metal Cordless Handheld Mics for Church Karaoke Singing, 4x50 Adjustable Frequency(G8 Battery 4 Handheld)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 2 mins
features: 4-CHANNEL WIRELESS MICROPHONE SYSTEM: ZERFUN G8 UHF Wireless Microphone System that are ending with an accessibly priced complete system which offers unbeatable value for money providing 4 separate channels each with a dedicated microphone, and receiver box with individual volume control. This system also featured with automatic frequency scanning and automatic transmitter setup for easy synchronization between transmitter and receiver.

VERSATILE OUTPUT: The devices and the chassis for the receiver are made from metal. The receiver has balanced 4 XLR outputs (one for each channel) and one mixed 1/4-Inch, one mixed 1/8-Inch output of all channels, making them more versatile, usually the receiver needs to be plugged into another device, such as an audio interface, an amplifier, or a mixing board. It is precision engineered and is solidly built to deliver professional quality, world-renowned sound.

TRANSMISSION RANGE: The ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System can support up to 200 feet range, 50 compatible frequencies on each channel(4 X 50) for interference-free reception. The UHF frequencies range within 500 - 599 MHz, are compliant with the FCC regulations. BATTERY INFO: Each microphone use 2 x AA batteries(Package Not Include) that last Up to 7-8 hours of continuous use from fresh AA batteries.

HIGH QUALITY: ZERFUN Wireless Microphones have sturdy all metal construction for Quad-channel UHF wireless microphone receiver and high sensitivity unidirectional handheld mics, suitable for heavy use. High quality dynamic cartridge is specially engineered to limit feedback and interference, picking up sound smoothly and transmitting sound hassle-free. Each microphone channel in this system has an individual volume control.

PACKAGE LIST: ZERFUN Wireless Microphone x 4; G8 Receiver Box x 1; Antenna x 2; Power Adapter x 1; 6.35mm to 6.35mm Cable x 1; 3.5mm to 3.5mm Cable x 1; Audio Cable x 1; Microphone Windscreen x 4; Antiskid Ring x 4; User Manual x 1. Genuine ZERFUN Wireless Microphone products come with supportive 24-Hours After-Sales Customer Service, 12-month Manufacturer Assurance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Freedom to express yourself – that’s the real point of wireless mics. Yes, they’re more convenient. Yes, they stop you from tripping your bandmates up, and yes, you’ll no longer pull your drummer’s kit apart every time you run to the opposite side of the stage. ZERFUN always focus on the development of microphone products, and you really can’t go wrong with the ZERFUN Wireless Microphone System Kit. Beautifully made, impeccably designed and ultra-reliable, this is a bundle that will serve small groups and soloists well but can grow into a monster system if needed. Whether for your bar, church, or small home karaoke party, the best systems give you peace of mind and let you focus on your speech or performance.

ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System The ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System delivers superior sounds and professional features. It can support up to 200 feet range, 50 selectable frequencies on every channel, so you can expect to have a lot of ample space to the sound source. The frequencies range from 500 to 599 MHz, and it uses the UHF system. This model is quite easy to use with multiple systems, and it’s a great mic that you can use at recreational events and professional grounds. If you want a system that delivers according to its quality, this is the one to get. Furthermore, It also featured with automatic frequency scanning and automatic transmitter setup for easy synchonization between transmitter and receiver. We became musicians because, we wanted to reveal our creative handiwork without boundaries. The whole world is a stage, so why limit ourselves to just 25ft of it?

200 Adjustable Microphone Frequency for Interference-Free Reception The ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System can support up to 200 feet range, 50 compatible frequencies on each channel(4 X 50) for interference-free reception. The UHF frequencies range within 500 - 599 MHz, are compliant with the FCC regulations. Note: If you experience these situations: Microphone cut in & outMicrophone working range very shortMicrophone sound lot of noise, too much feedback, weak sound, etc. Receiver RF Signal Indicator flashesReceiver volume control can't adjust microphone volume First Check the normal working status of microphone and receiver: 1. Receiver power Indicator is on and the antennas are correctly installed; 2. microphone power Indicator is on; 3. Receiver RF Signal Indicator A, B, C, D is on(Means microphone A, B, C, D have connect with receiver rightly. NOTE: The Microphone Volume Control of Receiver is also Microphone RF Signal Indicator). If all yes, it means microphone and receiver device have no quality problem. SOLUTIONS: Most of the time, the microphone and receiver have no quality problem, very likely that the current microphone frequency is being disturbed, so we need to switch microphone frequency to avoid interference(How to change microphone frequency, refer to User Manual -> OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS -> POINT 3). See whether this can solve the problem. If not, try to reset current microphone connection with receiver(How to reset, refer to User Manual -> OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS -> POINT 5), then change microphone frequency again. The above operations can basically solve most product problems. Besides, you also need to notice potential nearby sources of RF interference, such as CD players, computers, digital devices, earphone monitoring systems, etc. Multiple Sets Using: When work with 2 sets or more simultaneously, please make sure mics are set with different channels. If multiple systems are being used, increase the frequency separation between systems.

Well-Made Metallic Cardioid Handheld Microphone With Channel Control ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphones have sturdy all metal construction for Quad-channel UHF wireless microphone receiver and high sensitivity unidirectional handheld mics, suitable for heavy use. High quality dynamic cartridge is specially engineered to limit feedback and interference, picking up sound smoothly and transmitting sound hassle-free. The excellent response of ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphones is tailored to live vocal use. They are well-made metallic cardioid microphones which means they pick up noise uni-directionally. With this pickup pattern, the directional vocals are easy to isolate from background noise. Each microphone use 2 x AA batteries(Batteries Not Include) that last Up to 7-8 hours of continuous use from fresh AA batteries.

How To Connect To Multiple Devices The receiver has balanced 4 XLR outputs (one for each channel) and one mixed 1/4-Inch, one mixed 1/8-Inch output of all channels, making them more versatile, usually the receiver needs to be plugged into another device, such as an audio interface, an amplifier, or a mixing board. NOTE: Need to connect to Speaker/Amplifier to output the sound How to connect ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System to a speaker/amplifier ? Microphone –> Receiver –> Speaker/Amplifier (Ensure you insert the cable plug into the "MIC" input port on the Amplifier)Receiver Physically Connects To A Speaker/Amplifier Interface How to connect ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System to a TV ? Microphone –> Receiver/TV –> Audio Amplifier/Mixer –> Speaker/Home TheaterYou’ll need to use an intermediate device to connect microphone and TV. This is called an amplifier or mixer. It allows you to mix the audio from the microphone and TV together and for them to be both played out of the speaker, this allows you to play karaoke. How to connect ZERFUN G8 Wireless Microphone System to a computer ? Microphone –> Receiver –> Audio Interface –> ComputerReceiver Physically Connects To An Audio Interface(With an analog-to-digital converter); Audio Interface Physically Connects To The Computer

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS General Carrier Frequency: 500 - 599 MHzModulation Mode: FMPeak Deviation: ±45kHzAudio Response: 50Hz - 15kHzComprehensive SNR: >105dB(A)THD at 1 kHz: <0.3%Operating Temperature: 14 - 131°FRange of Operation: 164' - 262.5' Receiver Oscillation Mode: PLL(Digital Frequency Synthesizer)Stray Reject: ≥80 dBImage Reject: ≥80 dBSensitivity: 5 dBuAudio Output LevelXLR Output Jack: 800 mV1/4" Output Jack: 800 mVOperating Voltage: DC 12VOperating Current: ≤300 mA Handheld Transmitter RF Power Output: ≤10 mWOscillation Mode: PLL(Digital Frequency Synthesizer)Frequency Stability: <30 ppmDynamic Range: ≥ 100 dB(A)Frequency Response: 50Hz - 15kHzMaximum Input Pressure: 130 dB SPLMicrophone Pickup: Moving CoilPower Supply: 2 x 1.5V Batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well functioning wireless microphone system
reviews.reviewText: Wireless microphone systems extend the flexibility of sound systems. They offer the ability to move microphone sources more easily to extended geographic areas.This system does even more. The unit includes 4 wireless unidirectional microphones, which simultaneously mix into the system. Each has its own volume control on the front of the unit and there is an input for a fifth wired microphone.Microphones are letter- and color-coded to make it easier to match to the unit. It has a mixed 1/4" and 1/8" output jacks. The broadcast frequency is displayed on the microphones themslves, which run on two AA batteries. You can easily expect several hours of use from the batteries.The unit itself is wired into the speaker system, offering approximately 200 ft microphone distance from the unit.Antiskid rings and foam shields are included, which help tremendously in use and when you want to set them down.The sound is good and reasonably clear. They work as they should. These are a good asset and offer more flexibility than a single microphone unit, at a much more impressive price.
